author: Cameron Mcdonough
title: Martellus Bennett Has Epic Takedown Of Twitter User Commenting On Contract | New England Patriots | NESN.com
text:
by Cameron McDonough on Wed, Feb 22, 2017 at 6:49PM 726 Tweet 
If you have the belief that professional athletes should take less money to stay with your favorite team, you probably should take a look at Martellus Bennett‚Äôs Twitter. 
Bennett could be in for a huge raise in free agency, as he‚Äôs coming off a Super Bowl-winning campaign with the Patriots. A report surfaced Tuesday night that there‚Äôs a ‚Äúreal possibility‚Äù his next contract won‚Äôt be with New England, although Bennett played down the rumor and said he‚Äôs ‚Äújust chilling.‚Äù 
One day after that news came out, a Twitter user offered a take on Bennett‚Äôs contract situation, and the tight end had a response for the ages. 
Here‚Äôs how it all began: 
There‚Äôs a lot wrong with that take, and Bennett let the user know it with a epic series of tweets. (Warning: Explicit language.) First of all put some respeck on my name it's Martellus. And the patriots didn't hand me anything me and my teammates earned that shit. https://t.co/mn2Pbol8bg 
‚Äî Martellus Bennett (@MartysaurusRex) February 22, 2017 And you have no idea what I want. If you don't hear it from me stop believing repeating the shit. https://t.co/mn2Pbol8bg 
‚Äî Martellus Bennett (@MartysaurusRex) February 22, 2017 Everyone trying to guess what another man is thinking and projecting that into the world is irresponsible. 
‚Äî Martellus Bennett (@MartysaurusRex) February 22, 2017 Damn reports are like the people that talk during the movie trying to guess who the killer is. 
‚Äî Martellus Bennett (@MartysaurusRex) February 22, 2017 Ass-umptions. 
‚Äî Martellus Bennett (@MartysaurusRex) February 22, 2017 And stop @'ing me about taking less money. You take less money and your job? All of you take a pay cut hahaha. 
‚Äî Martellus Bennett (@MartysaurusRex) February 22, 2017 Bro I don't care about this attention shit. What does having your attention do to better my life? You have no idea what you're talking about https://t.co/WPVjwf5FJs 
‚Äî Martellus Bennett (@MartysaurusRex) February 22, 2017 All I'm saying is cut your own grass don't be all in my garden fucking with my fruit while weeds are growing all over yours. 
‚Äî Martellus Bennett (@MartysaurusRex) February 22, 2017 Anyways I love you all. ü§óü§ó I hope you all get a raise today or tomorrow. 
‚Äî Martellus Bennett (@MartysaurusRex) February 22, 2017 
Now that‚Äôs how you deal with online haters.
